data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Well, not so bad really - but I have to admit it is a bit of a cheat. There i_ another rol___ coaster wh___ is su__ a ro___ ride th__ hardly any___ can sto____ it b__ this o__ has be__ specially desi____ to gi__ you ju__ a fla___ of wh__ the re__ one i_ like. Are you ready to try it?
data.fullContent: Well, not so bad really - but I have to admit it is a bit of a cheat. There is another roller coaster which is such a rough ride that hardly anyone can stomach it but this one has been specially designed to give you just a flavor of what the real one is like. Are you ready to try it?
data.answer: 嗯，其实还不算太糟——但我不得不承认这有点像作弊。还有另一种过山车，它非常颠簸，几乎没有人能忍受，但这个是专门设计的，让你感受一下真正的过山车是什么样子。你准备好试一试了吗?
